questions.question_text:
Northern Trail Outfitters wants to track ROI for contacts that are key stakeholders for opportunities. The VP of sales requested that this information be accessible on the opportunity and available for reporting.
Which two options should the administrator configure to meet these requirements? (Choose two.)

choices.A: Add the Campaign Member related list to the Opportunity page layout.
choices.D: Add the Opportunity Contact Role related list to the Opportunity page layout.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Answer should be C

questions.question_text:
Ursa Major Solar has service level agreements (SLA) that are routed to support queues. Cases that meet the 24 hour SLA need to be automatically re-assigned to the next tier queue.
Which feature should be used to fulfill this requirement?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Should be Create a dashboard with the running user set as someone who can see all opportunities.

questions.question_text:
Users at DreamHouse Realty are only allowed to see opportunities they own. Leadership wants an enterprise-wide dashboard of all open opportunities in the pipeline so that users can see how the company is performing at any point in time.
How should an administrator create the dashboard without changing any sharing settings?

choices.B: Update the dashboard folder settings to manager for the sales reps role.
choices.C: Create a dashboard with the running user set as someone who can see all opportunities.
choices.D: Build individual dashboards for profiles that need to see the enterprise results.
choices.A: Add a filter to the dashboard to filter the opportunities by owner role.

questions.question_text:
The administrator at Universal Containers wants to add branding to Salesforce.
Which two considerations should the administrator keep in mind? (Choose two.)

choices.A: Up to 150 custom themes can be created, modified, or cloned from the built-in themes.
choices.B: Only one theme can be active at a time, and a theme applies to the entire org.
choices.C: Themes apply to Salesforce Classic and to the Salesforce mobile app.
choices.D: Chatter external users see the built-in Lightning blue theme only.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
If they shouldn't be enable from getting deleted, D is correct and not C.

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks wants to track shoe designs by products. Shoe designs should be unable to be deleted, and there can be multiple designs for one product across various stages.
Which two steps should the administrator configure to meet this requirement? (Choose two.)

choices.B: Use the standard object for designs.
choices.C: Add a custom master-detail field for shoe designs on the Product object.
choices.A: Create a custom object for shoe designs.
choices.D: Configure a custom lookup field for shoe designs on the Product object.
